Various utilities for working with SWT.

static Point getCenterPosition(Control control, int xOffset, int yOffset)
          Returns the Point a control need to be located at to be in the center of the primary monitor (and an offset up or down).

Method Detail

moveOntoMonitor

public static Point moveOntoMonitor(Rectangle controlBounds,
                                    Monitor monitor)
adjusts a rectangle, so that it stays on the client-ares of a given monitor

getCenterPosition

public static Point getCenterPosition(Control control,
                                      int xOffset,
                                      int yOffset)
Returns the Point a control need to be located at to be in the center of the primary monitor (and an offset up or down). The point is also adjusted that the composite completely stays on the primary monitor.

getRelativeCenterPosition

public static Point getRelativeCenterPosition(Control control,
                                              Control referenceControl,
                                              int xOffset,
                                              int yOffset)
Returns the Point a control need to be located at to be in the center of the reference control (and 150px up). The point is also adjusted that the composite completely stays on the monitor the reference control is on.

findAllChildren

public static <E extends Control> ImmutableList<E> findAllChildren(Composite parent,
                                                                   Class<E> clazz)
